long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Idle Lumber Inc is a captivating and addictive game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, you step into the shoes of a lumber tycoon and manage your own lumber company. Your goal is to become the ultimate timber magnate by cutting down trees, upgrading your equipment, and expanding your business empire.

As the game's name suggests, it features an idle gameplay mechanic, which means you can progress and earn money even when you're not actively playing. The more you play and invest in your company, the faster your earnings grow.

The game offers a variety of features to enhance your gameplay experience. You can hire workers to automate the tree-cutting process, unlock new regions to explore and exploit, and upgrade your machinery to increase efficiency. Additionally, you can participate in special events and challenges to earn bonus rewards and unlock exclusive content.

Idle Lumber Inc provides a visually appealing and immersive gameplay environment. The graphics are colorful and vibrant, and the sound effects add to the overall enjoyment. With its simple yet addictive gameplay mechanics, it's a great choice for casual players and fans of idle games.

You can enjoy Idle Lumber Inc for free by visiting the website https://classroom-6x.org/. So jump into the world of lumber business and see if you have what it takes to build a timber empire!
